title: Centurion.Start
body:
<<if visited("Centurion.GiveBread") is true>>

<<else>> 
    <<if visited("Centurion.Start") is  true>> 

    <<else>> 
        <<obliterate ExclamationMarkCenturion>> 
        << set $player_saw_centurion to true >>
        <<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_001r02>>
        <<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
        Centurion: Salvē! Sum centurio! Quid tibi nomen est?
        <<playSound CameraRig Titus/Titus-C_001r04>>
        Titus: Nomen mihi est Titus. Quid hodie agis?
        <<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_002r01p1>>
        <<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
        Centurion: Satis bene. Vere esurio...
    <<endif>> 
        <<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_002r01p2>>
        <<playAnimation Centurion Clap>> 
        Centurion: Mihi opus panis!
    <<if $player_has_panis is true>>
        <<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_003r01p1>>
        <<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
        Centurion: Ō! Quid nasus meus sentit?
        <<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_003r01p2>>
        <<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
        Centurion: Estne ille...?
        <<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_003r01p3>>
        <<playAnimation Centurion Clap>> 
        Centurion: PANIS????
        <<playSound CameraRig Titus/Titus-C_002r02>>
        Titus: Certe est panis, mi amice!
        <<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_004r01>>
        <<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
        Centurion: Possumne panem habēre, amabo te?
        [[Ita vero amice!|Centurion.GiveBread]]
        [[Minime! Hic panis est meus.|Centurion.DontGiveBread ]] 
    <<else>>
        <<stopSound Centurion>> 
        << if $player_saw_antonia is true >>
        Titus: (To self): Maybe I need to get a specific item from the shop.
        << else>>
        Titus: (To self): I should go find a shop.
        << endif>> 
    <<endif>> 
<<endif>> 
<<stopSound Centurion>>

title: Centurion.GiveBread
body:
<<playSound CameraRig Titus/Titus-C_005r01>>
Titus: Hīc is est! Cena bene!
<<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_005r03p1>>
<<playAnimation Centurion Clap>> 
Centurion: Pani gratias tibi ago!
<<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_005r03p2>>
<<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
Centurion: Quomodo tibi remunerationem dare umquam poteram?
<<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_005r03p3>>
<<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
Centurion: In perpetuum amabo hunc panem!
<<playSound CameraRig Titus/Titus-C_006r02>>
Titus: Satis bene? (under breath): Hic centurio est insanus.
<<stopSound Centurion>> 
<<gotThePanis Centurion>>

title: Centurion.DontGiveBread
body:
<<playSound CameraRig Titus/Titus-C_007r04>>
Titus: Tibi panem non dabo. Panis mecum in perpetuum remanebit.
<<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_006r05p1>>
<<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
Centurion: Quare????
<<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_006r05p2>>
<<playAnimation Centurion Talk>> 
Centurion: Quare mihi hoc facis, Tite? 
<<playSound Centurion Centurion/Centurion_006r05p3>>
<<playAnimation Centurion HeadShake>> 
Centurion: Mihi carus non es. Bellus non es. Nunc fuge! 
<<stopSound Centurion>>
